widget.name: List view swipe
widget.description: Enable swipe action on a list view

property.caption: Target list view
property.description: Name of the list view. Place this widget directly below the list view

property.caption: Transparent swipe
property.description: Make item gradually transparent while swiping

property.caption: List view entity
property.description: Entity type of the list view items, passed as context to the 'Open page' or 'Execute microflow' action

property.caption: Action delay
property.description: Wait number of microseconds after swiping before triggering the action. To let the animation finish, except for 'After swipe' 'Move back'

property.caption: Page left
property.description: Page to show after swiping, should contain a 'List view entity' data view. Only applicable for 'On swipe' 'Show a Page'

property.caption: Microflow left
property.description: Microflow to execute after swiping. Only applicable for 'On swipe' 'Call a microflow'

property.caption: Swipe container left
property.description: Optional, name of the container which shown as background during swiping

property.caption: After swipe left
property.description: Animate effect after swipe: Continue the swipe movement 'out' of the list view. Animate 'hiding'' the item to zero height. 'Reset' the item immediate back to its original position. Animate the item 'back'' to it original position. Show the background 'buttons' by sticking to their side.

property.caption: Hide container left
property.description: Optional, name of the container which shows a message during hide animation. Only applicable when 'After swipe' is 'Move out, hide'

property.caption: Page right
property.description: Page to show after swiping, should contain a 'List view entity' data view. Only applicable for 'On swipe' 'Show a Page'

property.caption: Swipe container right
property.description: Optional, name of the container which shown as background during swiping

property.caption: After swipe right
property.description: Animate effect after swipe: Continue the swipe movement 'out' of the list view. Animate 'hiding'' the item to zero height. 'Reset' the item immediate back to its original position. Animate the item 'back'' to it original position. Show the background 'buttons' by sticking to their side.

property.caption: Hide container right
property.description: Optional, name of the container which shows a message during hide animation. Only applicable when 'After swipe' is 'Move out, hide'
